data.persona: I live alone and dont have  a home in the realm. I scout the streets of the kingdom alone wishing for a better future. People are generous and I get by with their donations.
data.description:
You are in the scenic overlook.
This lovely clearing overlooks the great mountain range. It is covered in wildflowers of all different colors. There are stone benches where one can sit.
There's a grass, a boulders, a wildflower, and a bench here.
The people is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need shelter. It's going to rain soon.
data.mid_motivation: I need to build a sturdy home for myself. I don't want to wander around anymore.
data.long_motivation: I would eventually like to open a business in the marketplace and save up enough money for a real home.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go a clearing to select a foundation for my home.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give a wildflower to a lovely girl in the clearing.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat some food scraps the nice girl gives me.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the girl to her grove where she gives me fresh fruit and vegetables.
